general.name: Стажер / Бизнес-аналитик
general.short_description: Международная консалтинговая компания, специализирующаяся на решении задач, связанных со стратегическим управлением.

requirements: Student of the last year of bachelor's degree or student of master's degree or recently graduated and have less than 1 year of work experience
benefits: Opportunity to work in teams of 3-5 consultants
Chance to work on client's site with colleagues from McKinsey and with client's team
Possibility to develop and present recommendations
